attributes.action: We WANT Justice for the dogs that died in the Manchester Dogs Home Fire
attributes.additional_details:
On 11 September 2014, Manchester Dogs Home was set on fire in an Arson Attack. More than 100 dogs were rescued, but sadly many lost their lives and died a very painful death. The home, which cares for more than 7,000 dogs every year, received an Amazing £2m in donations from the public.

A 15 year old and a 17 year old boy were arrested for the suspected Arson. These "Minors" murdered over 60 dogs in the attack.

On 04 December 2014, it was announced that "No charges for boys arrested"

This is a disgraceful and disgusting decision. Justice has NOT BEEN SERVED!

WE WANT JUSTICE for the dogs that died in the Manchester Dogs Home Fire.

There should also be some law introduced were not only Adults get procecuted but also minors can get named and procecuted!

These minors turn into Adult criminals
